articles.author: Tom Ravenscroft
articles.title: Pepsi unveils "unapologetic" logo focused on brand's heritage - Dezeen
articles.description: Pepsi has unveiled its first rebrand in 14 years with an updated logo that draws on its 90s branding and uses black wording.
articles.content:
Drinks brand Pepsi has unveiled its first rebrand in 14 years with an updated logo that draws on its 1990s branding and uses black wording to draw attention to Pepsi Zero Sugar.
Released to mark the… [+3138 chars]

articles.title: Disney to lay off 7000 staff, shuts down metaverse division - GamesIndustry.biz
articles.description: The Walt Disney Company has shut down its metaverse division as part of a round of layoffs. The news was first reported…
articles.content:
The Walt Disney Company has shut down its metaverse division as part of a round of layoffs.
